thread.title: Sauce Labs Named One of the San Francisco Business Times' Top 100 Fastest-Growing Private Companies in the Bay Area for a Second Consecutive Year
thread.title_full: Sauce Labs Named One of the San Francisco Business Times' Top 100 Fastest-Growing Private Companies in the Bay Area for a Second Consecutive Year

author: admin
title: Sauce Labs Named One of the San Francisco Business Times' Top 100 Fastest-Growing Private Companies in the Bay Area for a Second Consecutive Year
text:
Companies mentioned in this article: Sauce Labs, Inc. 
SAN FRANCISCO, CA -- (Marketwired) -- 10/26/15 -- Sauce Labs, Inc. , the leading cloud-based web and mobile application testing platform, today announced it has been named to the Top 100 Fastest-Growing Private Companies in the Bay Area list by the San Francisco Business Times a second consecutive year, ranking #18 on this year's list. 
"Sauce Labs is proud to again be recognized as one of the Bay Area's fastest-growing companies," said Charles Ramsey, CEO of Sauce Labs. "As the web and mobile application market continues to experience explosive growth, software development teams are feeling tremendous pressure to deliver more features faster. Sauce Labs frees development teams from the hassle, time and cost associated with test infrastructure, so they can focus on their core competency -- which is innovating and delivering amazing applications." 
Now in its 24th year, the San Francisco Business Times' Top 100 Fastest-Growing Private Companies in the Bay Area list covers nearly every industry. Its alumni include several iconic brands and companies such as Salesforce.com, Jamba Juice, Joie de Vivre Hospitality and DPR Construction. This year's winners were selected based on net revenue growth from fiscal years 2012 - 2014. 
Sauce Labs' instantly scalable testing cloud is optimized for continuous integration (CI) and continuous delivery (CD). When tests are automated and run in parallel on virtual machines across multiple browsers and platforms, testing time is reduced and developer time is freed from managing infrastructure. 
With more people accessing the web on mobile devices, Sauce helps developers test web, hybrid and native mobile apps across a wide range of emulators so that they can get quality apps to market faster. Sauce Labs currently supports more than 600 browser, operating system and device platform combinations.
